summary: Successfully created a comprehensive cursor rules initialization template for organizing research and information. Implemented SPARC methodology with enhanced file organization scripts, cross-platform compatibility, and dark mode UI. Created organize-files-enhanced.sh with comprehensive error handling, setup-new-project.sh for new project initialization, comprehensive usage guide, and updated documentation. The template now supports automatic ZIP extraction, semantic file naming, backup systems, and GitHub Pages deployment with modern web interface.
current_status: Complete research template system with enhanced organization capabilities, comprehensive documentation, and ready-to-use scripts for new research projects. All files are organized, documented, and ready for deployment. The system follows SPARC methodology and includes chain of thought development with optimal user experience and dark mode UI preferences.
